title: Mathieu van der Poel Realistic about Quest for Monument Sweep: ‘Even with Roubaix Legs I Cannot Follow Pogačar’
content:
Road world champion soon to decide on participation in Olympic MTB event: 'I don’t want to gamble on two horses and maybe come up short.'

Read the full article at Mathieu van der Poel Realistic about Quest for Monument Sweep: ‘Even with Roubaix Legs I Cannot Follow Pogačar’ on Velo.
author: sstokes
